title: ‘Creepy!’: Pilot reports seeing ‘silver canister’ in Rhode Island skies in apparent UFO sighting, chilling audio emerges
description: A recording of an eerie moment a pilot reported seeing an apparent UFO to air traffic control has resurfaced.

title: Pilot reports 'silver cannister' UFO feet from his plane during 'creepy' air traffic control call: 'Good luck with the aliens'

description: "Good luck with the aliens!" an Air Traffic Controller said.

title: Did a rash of 1940s sightings lead to plans for a national UFO conference in Louisiana?
description: Explore the history of UFO sightings in central Louisiana, including the 1947 national conference that never happened and significant reports from the area.
